meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of figures or shapes.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a figural sculpture of a horse.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed coloring figural shapes in their activity books.
meanings.sent3: The figural clouds in the sky looked like fluffy animals playing.
meanings.sent4: Her figural interpretation of the music brought the audience to tears.
meanings.sent5: The figural patterns on the wallpaper made the room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: Represented by a figure or symbol.
meanings.sent1: The map had figural representations of landmarks for easy navigation.
meanings.sent2: The logo of the company was a figural representation of a soaring eagle.
meanings.sent3: The figural emblem on his shirt was a quirky smiley face.
meanings.sent4: Her figural depiction of the story added depth to the narrative.
meanings.sent5: The figural symbol on the ancient artifact held great significance to historians.
